title: Miami Spy Games: Russian Zombie Gun, Part Four
description: The zombie attack at the Setai has the ACES team scrambling to keep up. The Russian Zombie Gun is on the move, and the team is one step behind. The team is scrambling, and Jennifer Sanchez is close to the breaking point. The Miami ACES team continues their search for the Russian Zombie Gun in the gripping fourth installment of Miami Spy Games.Publisher Note: You can now purchase all 12 episodes together in one book!
author: Armand Rosamilia
